TopicTitle: War Thunder - Screenshots and Discussion thread!

Articles.Content: My PC automatically runs it at ultralow, but even at that level, it's still a pretty game. I really don't mind War Thunder ultralow at the moment, but I'm going to look into getting a higher level working.
It took me most of the night to download the update, will try it when I have time
I think I just found a scene from the movie Stalingrad that perfectly describes me whenever I try to land in WT.
If only my computer DID take screenshots and UPDATE WT.

MUAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!

Oh boy, I love the A-20, it's the most OP plane in the game!
It's such a frustrating game I used to like it but its utter garbage now...

I am enjoying war thunder more now. Whats wrong with it in your opinion?

Edited November 11, 2015 by gag09

It's such a frustrating game I used to like it but its utter garbage now...

Ehm, why?
I feel like using the pe-8's 5000kg is a cointoss. The explosion is massive and it is possible to team kill on accident. Especially when your teammates are in the enemy spawn for some reason.

I've started doing German tanks whenever I get bored/have bad luck with planes. Today, I got the StuG III, which is surprisingly good, despite the fact that it reminds me of the short school bus and must turn its entire body around to aim. I was able to one shot almost every tank I found today, thanks to this beast!

I've started doing German tanks whenever I get bored/have bad luck with planes. Today, I got the StuG III, which is surprisingly good, despite the fact that it reminds me of the short school bus and must turn its entire body around to aim. I was able to one shot almost every tank I found today, thanks to this beast!

http://i.imgur.com/6NTYOJS.jpg

But remember for everyone 1 shot you do! So can it be done to you! That really "erks" me about the game. You become so focused on 1 shooting targets and become so aggressive, you end up getting 1 shot-ed yourself and typically leaving the match with an negative attitude.
Well, nobody's posted anything today, I guess I'll just put up some more StuG praise.
